column4: im having a problem with getting stuff from my media server to my desktop. can anyone help please im getting a "cannot allocate memory" error when i try to transfer stuff over the network.
im having a problem with getting stuff from my media server to my desktop. can anyone help please im getting a "cannot allocate memory" error when i try to transfer stuff over the network.
What are you using to transfer over the network?
I mean, did you already share them from the server?
